Class spin_mutex

boost::sync::spin_mutex

Synopsis

// In header: <boost/sync/mutexes/spin_mutex.hpp>


class spin_mutex {
public:
  // construct/copy/destruct
  spin_mutex() noexcept;
  spin_mutex(mutex const &) = delete;
  spin_mutex & operator=(mutex const &) = delete;
  ~spin_mutex();

  // public member functions
  void lock() noexcept;
  bool try_lock() noexcept;
  void unlock() noexcept;
};

Description

spin_mutex public construct/copy/destruct

  1. spin_mutex() noexcept;
    Default constructor.

    Creates a mutual exclusion primitive in the unlocked state. 

  2. spin_mutex(mutex const &) = delete;
  3. spin_mutex & operator=(mutex const &) = delete;
  4. ~spin_mutex();
    Destructor.

    Destroys the mutual exclusion primitive.

    Requires:

    The primitive is in the unlocked state.

spin_mutex public member functions

  1. void lock() noexcept;
    Locks the mutex.

    If the mutex is not locked, the method locks it and returns. Otherwise the method blocks until the mutex is unlocked. 

  2. bool try_lock() noexcept;
    Attempts to lock the mutex.

    If the mutex is not locked, the method locks it and returns true. Otherwise the method returns false. 

  3. void unlock() noexcept;
    Unlocks the mutex.

    Releases the mutex that has been locked by the current thread.

    Requires:

    The mutex is locked by the current thread.
